pageContext.claim: “It’s social media, and it gets out in the world, and the reason I do well is that I can be treated unfairly and very dishonestly by CNN, and, you know, I have — what do have now, John, 158 million, including Facebook, including Twitter, including Instagram, including every form, I have a 158 million people. Reporting just this morning, they said 158 million.”
pageContext.analysis: Adding up eight social media accounts either assigned to Trump or the White House — @realdonaldtrump on Twitter, DonaldTrump on Facebook,@POTUS on Twitter, WhiteHouse on Facebook, realdonaldtrump on Instagram, whitehouse on Instagram, POTUS on Facebook, 1,684,255 followers and potus on Instagram — we count about 130 million followers. However, potus on Instagram has 15 million followers but has never posted so we are not sure if that should be counted, since Trump is talking about the reach of his message.
